page.title: 11Post Bus: Denny to FINTRY
page.content:
The only regular daily transport service to the village, which is not primarily for school children, is the Denny Post Bus. Even this, saving Fridays, is only a one way service.
The vehicle is a mini-bus which combines postal collection with pasenger carrying. Starting from and returning to Denny, the service operates throughout the year.
Monday to Thursday it runs in the single direction to Denny and leaves at 11am each day.
On Fridays it returns and does an additional trip at 4pm.
It is mainly used by tourists, as the timetable is not very practical for village folk.
